title: Elle Ferguson's fiance Joel Patfull puts his home up for sale after a stunning transformation
text:
Elle Ferguson's fiance Joel Patfull moved to Sydney some time ago to live with the model and fashion influencer.

And on Wednesday, the former AFL player put his Brisbane home up for sale after what can only be described as a stunning transformation.

The three-bedroom house looks unrecognisable since Joel bought it in a rather dilapidated state for $716,000, back in 2008.

No work required! Elle Ferguson’s (right) fiance Joel Patfull (left) has put his home up for sale after a stunning transformation on Wednesday

‹ Slide me › Upgrade! The three-bedroom home looks unrecognisable since Joel bought it in a rather dilapidated state for $716,000, back in 2008. Swipe left for before and right for after

Eleven years ago, the property had peeling paint, dated interior design straight from the 70s and a severely overgrown garden.

But Joel has given it new life, with extensive renovations, including an added swimming pool, an open-plan living room and modern design throughout.

The pool is the statement feature of the 564 square metre block, with a sheltered outdoor lounge and room for deckchairs to lounge by the water nearby.

‹ Slide me › Spacious: Before, there was a cramped living room with barely enough room for a small couch, but now it has been completely opened up. Swipe left for before and right for after

‹ Slide me › Now we're cooking! Modern design, including white paint, new appliances and classic wooden floors have replaced the cheap and dated surfaces. Swipe left for before and right for after

Inside the home there was previously a cramped living room with barely enough room for a small couch, but now it has been completely opened up.

The kitchen, living and dining areas are all part of one large room, which leads to the balcony with a view of the garden and pool.

Modern design including bright white paint, new appliances and classic wooden floors have replaced the cheap and dated surfaces of old.

‹ Slide me › Makeover! Eleven years ago, the property had peeling paint, dated interior design straight from the 70s and a severely overgrown garden. Swipe left for before and right for after

Joel, 34, is a former Brisbane Lions player, while his model fiancée Elle, 33, runs a blogging empire with 671,000 Instagram followers.

Elle and Joel have been dating since the beginning of 2016 and eventually got engaged in December 2017.

It seems the model's stylish ways have rubbed off on Joel as the glamourous pair are often seen wearing a number of high-end brands to fashion events.
description: Elle Ferguson's fiance Joel Patfull has moved to Sydney to live with the model.
authors: Shive Prema For Daily Mail Australia
